00032 ultimix.multiple_input.InsertDeleteButton = function( Selector , Element )
00033 {
00034       jQuery( Element ).find( '.multiple_input_button' ).html( 
00035             '<div class="delete_button" onclick="ultimix.multiple_input.DeleteItem( \'' + Selector + '\' , this );">&nbsp;-&nbsp;</div>'
00036       );
00037 }

00050 ultimix.multiple_input.InsertAddButton = function( Selector , Element )
00051 {
00052       if( jQuery( Element ).find( '.multiple_input_button' ) > 1 )
00053       {
00054             jQuery( Element ).first( '.multiple_input_button' ).remove();
00055       }
00056       
00057       if( jQuery( Element ).parent().find( '.multiple_input_item' ).length == 1 )
00058       {
00059             jQuery( Element ).find( '.multiple_input_button' ).html( 
00060                   '<div class="add_button" onclick="ultimix.multiple_input.AddItem( \'' + Selector + '\' );">&nbsp;+&nbsp;</div>'
00061             );
00062       }
00063       else
00064       {
00065             jQuery( Element ).find( '.multiple_input_button' ).html( 
00066                   '<div class="add_button" onclick="ultimix.multiple_input.AddItem( \'' + Selector + '\' );">&nbsp;+&nbsp;</div>\
00067                   <div class="delete_button" onclick="ultimix.multiple_input.DeleteItem( \'' + Selector + '\' , this );">&nbsp;-&nbsp;</div>'
00068             );
00069       }
00070 }

00111 ultimix.multiple_input.GetElementCode = function( Selector , Values )
00112 {
00113       if( !Values )
00114       {
00115             Values = { 'value' : '' , 'visible_value' : '' };
00116       }
00117 
00118       var   Element = jQuery( Selector ).find( '.field_template' ).html();
00119       Element = ultimix.string_utilities.PrintRecord( Element , Values );
00120       Element = ultimix.string_utilities.StrReplace( '[name]' , jQuery( Selector ).find( '.field_name' ).html() , Element );
00121       
00122       return(
00123             ultimix.string_utilities.CompileTags(
00124                   '<div class="multiple_input_item">\
00125                         <div class="multiple_input_field">' + Element + '</div>\
00126                         <div class="multiple_input_button"></div>\
00127                         <div class="multiple_input_last_element"></div>\
00128                   </div>' 
00129             )
00130       );
00131 }

00142 ultimix.multiple_input.AddItem = function( Selector , Values )
00143 {
00144       ultimix.multiple_input.InsertDeleteButton( Selector , ultimix.multiple_input.FirstElement( Selector ) );
00145       
00146       jQuery( Selector ).prepend(   ultimix.multiple_input.GetElementCode( Selector , Values ) );
00147       
00148       ultimix.multiple_input.InsertAddButton( Selector , ultimix.multiple_input.FirstElement( Selector ) );
00149 }
00150 
00160 ultimix.multiple_input.AppendItem = function( Selector , Values )
00161 {
00162       jQuery( Selector ).append(    ultimix.multiple_input.GetElementCode( Selector , Values ) );
00163       
00164       ultimix.multiple_input.InsertDeleteButton( Selector , ultimix.multiple_input.LastElement( Selector ) );
00165       
00166       ultimix.multiple_input.InsertAddButton( Selector , ultimix.multiple_input.FirstElement( Selector ) );
00167 }
00168 
00180 ultimix.multiple_input.DeleteItem = function( Selector , Element )
00181 {
00182       ultimix.DeleteParentItem( jQuery( Element ).parent() );
00183       
00184       ultimix.multiple_input.InsertAddButton( Selector , ultimix.multiple_input.FirstElement( Selector ) );
00185 }

00219 ultimix.multiple_line.GetElementCode = function( Control , Object )
00220 {
00221       var         Template = Control.html();
00222       
00223       if( Object )
00224       {
00225             eval( 'var Data = ' + jQuery( Object ).html() );
00226             Template = ultimix.string_utilities.PrintRecord( Template , Data );
00227       }
00228       
00229       return( Template );
00230 }

00239 ultimix.multiple_line.ReviseDeleteButtons = function( Selector )
00240 {
00241       var         Container = jQuery( Selector ).parent();
00242 
00243       if( jQuery( Container ).find( 'table.multiple_line_single_line' ).length == 1 )
00244       {
00245             jQuery( Container ).find( 'span.multiple_line_delete_button' ).html( '&nbsp;' );
00246       }
00247       else
00248       {
00249             jQuery( Container ).find( 'span.multiple_line_delete_button' ).html( 
00250                   ultimix.multiple_line.CreateDelButton( Selector )
00251             );
00252       }
00253 }

00264 ultimix.multiple_line.OnAddElement = function( Button , Selector )
00265 {
00266       ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineForSelector( 
00267             Selector , false , jQuery( Button ).parents( 'table.multiple_line_single_line' )
00268       );
00269       
00270       ultimix.multiple_line.ReviseDeleteButtons( Selector );
00271 }

00282 ultimix.multiple_line.OnDelElement = function( Button , Selector )
00283 {
00284       jQuery( Button ).parents( 'table.multiple_line_single_line' ).remove();
00285       
00286       var         Control = jQuery( Selector );
00287       
00288       /* calling event handler */
00289       if( jQuery( Control ).attr( 'ondeleteline' ) )
00290       {
00291             eval( jQuery( Control ).attr( 'ondeleteline' ) );
00292       }
00293       
00294       ultimix.multiple_line.ReviseDeleteButtons( Selector );
00295 }

00336 ultimix.multiple_line.AppendLine = function( Selector , Line , AfterLine )
00337 {
00338       var               Container = jQuery( Selector ).parent();
00339       
00340       var               Code = '<table class="multiple_line_single_line"><tr><td style="width: 10px; font-family: Courier New;">' + 
00341             ultimix.multiple_line.CreateAddButton( Selector ) + '</td><td style="width: 10px; font-family: Courier New;">' + 
00342             ultimix.multiple_line.CreateDelButton( Selector ) + '</td><td style="width: 100%;">' + Line + '</td></tr></table>';
00343       
00344       var               AddedLine = false;
00345       if( AfterLine )
00346       {
00347             jQuery( AfterLine ).after( Code );
00348             AddedLine = jQuery( AfterLine ).next();
00349       }
00350       else
00351       {
00352             jQuery( Container ).append( Code );
00353             AddedLine = jQuery( Container ).find( 'table.multiple_line_single_line' ).last();
00354       }
00355       
00356       ultimix.multiple_line.ReviseDeleteButtons( Selector );
00357 
00358       return( AddedLine );
00359 }

00374 ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineInDOM = function( Selector , Object , AfterLine )
00375 {
00376       var               Control = jQuery( Selector );
00377       if( Control.length )
00378       {
00379             var               Line = ultimix.multiple_line.GetElementCode( Control , Object );
00380             var               AddedLine = ultimix.multiple_line.AppendLine( Selector , Line , AfterLine );
00381             if( Object )
00382             {
00383                   jQuery( Object ).remove();
00384             }
00385             return( AddedLine );
00386       }
00387       else
00388       {
00389             if( Object )
00390             {
00391                   jQuery( Object ).replaceWith( 
00392                         ultimix.get_string( 'dom_element' ) + ' "' + jQuery( Object ).attr( 'control' ) + '" ' + 
00393                         ultimix.get_string( 'was_not_found' )
00394                   );
00395             }
00396       }
00397 }

00410 ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineForSelector = function( Selector , Object , AfterLine )
00411 {
00412       if( Object && jQuery( Object ).html() )
00413       {
00414             eval( 'var Data = ' + jQuery( Object ).html() );
00415       }
00416       else
00417       {
00418             eval( 'var Data = {}' );
00419       }
00420       
00421       var               AddedLine = ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineInDOM( Selector , Object , AfterLine );
00422       
00423       var               Control = jQuery( Selector );
00424       
00425       /* calling event handler */
00426       if( jQuery( Control ).attr( 'onaddline' ) )
00427       {
00428             eval( jQuery( Control ).attr( 'onaddline' ) + '( AddedLine , Data );' );
00429       }
00430 }

00439 ultimix.multiple_line.AddLine = function( Object )
00440 {
00441       ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineForSelector( jQuery( Object ).attr( 'control' ) , Object );
00442 }

00451 ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineInEmptyControl = function( Control )
00452 {
00453       if( jQuery( Control ).find( 'table.multiple_line_single_line' ).length == 0 )
00454       {
00455             ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineForSelector( jQuery( Control ).children().first() );
00456       }
00457 }

00465       function()
00466       {
00467             /* processing templates */
00468             jQuery( '.multiple_line_template' ).each(
00469                   function( Index , Object )

00471                         ultimix.multiple_line.CreateMultypleLineControl( Object );

00480                   }
00481             );

00484             jQuery( '.multiple_line_template' ).each(
00485                   function( Index , Object )
00486                   {
00487                         ultimix.multiple_line.AddLineInEmptyControl( jQuery( Object ).parent() );
00488                   }
00489             );
00490       }
00491 );
